pageContext.claim: “Look at what's going on with the steel industry in your district, also, by the way, along with Caterpillar, they're building steel mills, 38 steel mills all over the land, renovation and -- and a lot of new ones.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump, without evidence, routinely claims new steel mills are being built because of his tariffs. There is no basis to claim 38 new mills.
